arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ فِيْهِ مَا يُرْضِيكَ
وَأَسْأَلُكَ التَّوْفِيقَ فِيْهِ لِأَنْ أُطِيعَكَ وَلَا أَعْصِيَكَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah; on this day, I beseech You for that which pleases You,
And I seek Your protection against that which hurts You,
And I beseech You for leading me to obey You and avoid disobeying You,
O He Who treats the beseechers magnanimously.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma innī as-aluka fīhi mā yur-ḍīk
wa-as-alukat tawfīqa fīhi li-an uṭī`aka walā a`ṣiyak
